Sandwiches.description: A ham and cheese sandwich is a common type of sandwich. It is made by putting cheese and sliced ham between two slices of bread. The bread is sometimes buttered and/or toasted. Vegetables like lettuce, tomato, onion or pickle slices can also be included. Various kinds of mustard and mayonnaise are also common.
Bosna is a spicy Austrian fast food dish, said to have originated in either Salzburg or Linz. It is now popular all over western Austria and southern Bavaria.
